Name: Black Feather
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirit-forward but with rounded cognac and a hint of orange. For dry palates only. Some may prefer orange curaçao in place of triple sec.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2000 by Robert Hess and published on DrinkBoy.com .
Nutrition: One serving of Black Feather contains 156 calories
